Class MouseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.runtime.editor.MouseController

  • public class MouseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods relating to mouse control.

    1.0 15 May 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Method Detail

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(Page page,
                PropertiesPane propertiesPane,
                float relX,
                float relY,
                boolean onGroup)
        Called when the mouse is pressed.
        Parameters:
        page - The current page.
        propertiesPane - The properties pane reference.
        relX - The relative X position of the mouse press.
        relY - The relative Y position of the mouse press.
        onGroup - Indicates if the click was on the page area or not.

      • mouseReleased

        public boolean mouseReleased(Page page,
                    PropertiesPane propertiesPane,
                    float relX,
                    float relY,
                    boolean onGroup)
        Called when the mouse is released.
        Parameters:
        page - The current page.
        propertiesPane - The properties pane reference.
        relX - The relative X position of the mouse press.
        relY - The relative Y position of the mouse press.
        onGroup - Indicates if the click was on the page area or not.
        Returns:
        True if an object was moved.

      • mouseMoved

        public PageObject mouseMoved(Page page,
                    float relX,
                    float relY)
        Called when the mouse has been moved.
        Parameters:
        page - The current page.
        relX - The relative X position of the mouse.
        relY - THe relative Y position of the mouse.
        Returns:
        The page object under the mouse, if there is one, else null.
